itunes:title: Molly Shannon Enters With a Hello Molly!
title: Molly Shannon Enters With a Hello Molly!
description:
Hold onto something sturdy because Molly Shannon is about to blow you away. This week Claire and Ashley are mopping up tears as they wade through Molly Shannon’s heartfelt memoir filled to the brim with everything from family tragedy to SNL.  


Go to creditkarma.com/loanoffers to find the loan for you.

Get $125 off at Freshly.com/worm


We’re coming to Chicago!! Get tickets for our show at The Lincoln Lodge May 14 at 10pm!


We’re doing another live digital show with Momenthouse! This time it’s for the Australian-ish time zone on April 27, get tickets here!


Join the Patreon for new episodes every Thursday! This week we’re talking about The Ultimatum and more!

https://www.patreon.com/celebritymemoirbookclub 


Grab some wormy merch!!! Shop the celebrity worm, worms don’t rat, and more: https://celebritymemoirbookclub.square.site/


Our next comedy show at Nicky’s Unisex is Thursday, April 14 at 7 pm!!


Join the Facebook group to chat with the other worms! https://www.facebook.com/groups/cmbcwormhole


Follow us on Twitter @cmbc_podcast and Instagram @celebritymemoirbookclub 


Art by @adrianne_manpearl and theme song by @ashleesimpsonross



Support the show
